put.desc: Creates or updates a connection monitor test with the specified name under the given subscription, resource group and peering service.

params.name: resourceGroupName
params.desc: The name of the resource group.

params.name: peeringServiceName
params.desc: The name of the peering service.

params.name: connectionMonitorTestName
params.desc: The name of the connection monitor test

params.name: connectionMonitorTest
params.desc: The properties needed to create a connection monitor test

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation has failed.

get.desc: Lists all connection monitor tests under the given subscription, resource group and peering service.

params.name: resourceGroupName
params.desc: The name of the resource group.

params.name: peeringServiceName
params.desc: The name of the peering service.

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation has failed.
